https://tmrev.io/movie/91101-Crave 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wl17xkZK2ZDgr48wxam9BUp7I5M.jpg Aiden craves a better life. A life away from his gruesome job as a crime scene photographer, working alongside his detective friend Pete. A meaningful life where he can escape the hard streets of Detroit, fall in love with the perfect woman and save the world from evil. As Aiden's dark imagination starts to leak into reality, he meets Virginia, a younger woman with her own dilemmas and desires. Crave
